biotools.summary: TCRGP is a novel Gaussian process method that can predict if TCRs recognize certain epitopes. This method can utilize different CDR sequences from both TCRα and TCRβ chains from single-cell data and learn which CDRs are important in recognizing the different epitopes.

bioschemas.name: TCRGP
bioschemas.summary: TCRGP is a novel Gaussian process method that can predict if TCRs recognize certain epitopes. This method can utilize different CDR sequences from both TCRα and TCRβ chains from single-cell data and learn which CDRs are important in recognizing the different epitopes.
